forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain, heavy at times early. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain, heavy at times early. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low around -0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low near -0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
